TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-udidal,_odidal, title = nipaluma-udidal,_odidal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-udidal,_odidal} }

S.FORM: udidal, odidal 阿里山十大功勞 miala ku pudac i 3-6 a bulad, u caay a bataan a mihcan a kilang. nilacul u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika Huáng bǎi or huáng bò is one of the fifty fundamental herbs of traditional Chinese medicine. Known also as Cortex Phellodendri, it is the bark of one of two species of Phellodendron tree: Phellodendron amurense or Phellodendron chinense.

odidal, odidal 阿里山十大功勞 miala ko podac i 3-6 a bolad, o caay a bataan a mihcan a kilang. nilacol o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika Hoáng bǎi or hoáng bò is one of the fifty fondamental herbs of traditional Chinese medicine. Known also as Cortex Phellodendri, it is the bark of one of two species of Phellodendron tree: Phellodendron amorense or Phellodendron chinense.
